title: 歐洲議會議員Marie Arena：我譴責港府拘捕15名民主派人士

replies.msg:
🆕 Statement by @Mariearenaps: “I condemn the arrest of 15 pro-democracy figures, including several parliamentarians, in #HongKong 🇭🇰 on 18 April. Hong Kong's independent judicial system & rule of law must be preserved under the "one country, two systems" principle.”

“I also call on the @eu_eeas and EU leaders to remain vigilant in all situations where the current #Covid19 measures may be used as a pretext or disguise to crack down on freedom of expression or to intimidate peaceful and legitimate activism and elected representatives". 🇪🇺

https://twitter.com/EP_HumanRights/status/1252965068045721600?s=19
